act_info.full_title: Pregnancy and Infant Loss Awareness, Research and Care Act, 2015, S.O. 2015, c. 37
act_info.citation: Pregnancy and Infant Loss Awareness, Research and Care Act, 2015, S.O. 2015, c. 37

content.section: Pregnancy and Infant Loss Awareness Day
content.content:
1. October 15 in each year is proclaimed as Pregnancy and Infant Loss Awareness Day. 2. Omitted (amends, repeals or revokes other legislation). 3. Omitted
(provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 4. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
1. October 15 in each year is proclaimed as Pregnancy and Infant Loss Awareness Day.

2. Omitted (amends, repeals or revokes other legislation).

3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

4. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

______________
